amendment.description: Relative to the effective date following enactment of the Act.

action.text: SA 2926 fell when the motion to recommit was withdrawn.
Amendment SA 2926 proposed by Senator Grassley to Amendment SA 2898. (consideration: CR S3061; text: CR S3061) Relative to the effective date following enactment of the Act.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2926 proposed by Senator Grassley to Amendment SA 2898.
